name: Baby Hazel - Skin Care
description:
Now you can play Baby Hazel Skin Care game app for free on your favorite IOS device.
It is winter. Baby Hazel has returned home after playing in snow. So she looks a bit untidy and shivering with cold. Give a refreshing bath to Baby Hazel and then dress her up in winter costumes. Don't forget to apply winter cream and lip balm to her cracked skin and lips. Finally prepare healthy soup and cereals for our little princess and feed her with all love and care. Look at Baby Hazel's needs on time so that she does not lose patience and try. You may lose the game if you make her cry.
